moreabout.title: A propos de l'Open Panthéon
moreabout.text: Nous avons tous des personnes inspirantes dans notre Panthéon personnel, mais nous n'avons pas d'endroit où partager qui ils sont et comment ils impactent notre vie. L'Open Panthéon permet aux individis comme aux organisations d'honorer leurs héros personnels, de célébrer leur impact et de partager leur héritage dans le monde entier.

about.main_title: Nous sommes heureux de vous accueillir à l'Open Panthéon.
about.first_step_paragraph: Tout d'abord, nous vous invitons à célébrer les figures inspirantes présentes ou passées de votre communauté, pays ou globalement, qui ont joué un rôle clé autour de l'apprentissage. Ce rôle peut être lié à de nombreuses disciplines, notamment les arts, les sciences, le développement durable, la pédagogie, la santé et le bien-être, contribuant ce faisant à la coexistence pacifique entre humains et nature (en ligne avec les 17 Objectifs du Développement Durable des Nations Unies).
about.second_step_paragraph: Grâce à votre contribution collective, la plateforme de l'Open Panthéon vous offrira l'opportunité d'être inspiré par une liste croissante de personnes exemplaires, navigant à travers les siècles, cultures and disciplines.
about.first_section_first_paragraph: Les individus et organisations sont invités à nominer les personalités de leur choix dans leur Panthéon personnel (Mon Panthéon), à la condition que ces personnalités aient déjà une biographie sur Wikipedia* et qu'elles soient liées à des champs comme l'éducation, les sciences, la culture, et la promotion de la paix.
about.first_section_second_paragraph: Quand on ajoute une personalité à leur Panthéon, les organisations et les individus agissent en tant que sponsosr en écrivant un argument succinct expliquant leur choix (obligatoire). Ils peuvent aussi choisir d'ajouter des liens intéressants (articles, livres, etc.).
about.first_section_third_paragraph: Toutes les personalités nominées apparaissent dans la plateforme de l'Open Panthéon, avec un lien vers leur fiche Wikipedia et le commentaire de chaque organisation/individu célébrant leur héritage.
about.first_section_fourth_paragraph: Les processus d'intelligence collective distribuée permettent la célébration de célébrités locales comme internationales.
about.first_section_fifth_paragraph: Le moteur de recherche de l'Open Panthéon va offrir une opportunité unique de (re-)découvrir et être inspiré par diverses personnes à travers les siècles, les cultures, les communités et les genres.
about.first_section_sixth_paragraph: Un système de modération system va être mis en place sur la plateforme pour éviter les abus et gérer le cas des personalités et commentaires qui pourraient être considérés inappropriés par la communauté.
about.first_section_addendum: *Quand une figure inspirante n'existe pas sur Wikipedia, les organisations/ individus sont encouragés à créerune nouvelle fiche Wikipedia avant de commencer le processus de nomination de l'Open Panthéon.
about.second_section_first_paragraph: La version initiale de cette nouvelle plateforme en ligne globale est actuellement disponible en français et en anglais. Dans un futur proche, de nouveaux langages seront ajoutés, notablement les 4 autres langages officiels des Nations Unies (Arabe, Chinois, Russe et Espagnol).
about.second_section_addendum: Voudriez-vous nous aidez à ajouter d'autres langages? Contactez-nous à info@open-pantheon.org.
about.third_section_first_paragraph: En 2019, le CRI et l'UNESCO ont joint leurs forces pour faire naître l'initiative #LearningPlanet, qui fédère une communauté en croissance rapide d'organisations internationales (institutions, universités, entrepreneurs sociaux, associations, artistes, medias, etc.) qui travaillent sur tous les secteurs clés liés au futurs soutenables, specialement ceux des jeunes: éducation, santé, bien-être, droits, développement durable... Déterminées à augmenter et accélérer leur impact concret, ces organisations explorent et implementent des modèles collaboratifs radicaux. #LearningPlanet co-designent et co-construisent des programmes (cercles thématiques, événements, courses, projets thématiques, etc.) et outils digitaux ouverts (plateforme de projets, GPS de la connaissance, Open Panthéon) pour permettre aux membres de la communité d'atteindre leurs objectifs ambitieux ensemble.

faq.register_question: Dois-je créer un compte sur la plateforme pour nominer une personnalité?
faq.register_answer: Vous pouvez naviguer sur la plateforme sans vous enregistrer, mais vous devrez vous créer un compte pour nominer la personnalité de votre choix et la commenter. De fait, l'intérêt de l'Open Pantheon n'est pas seulement de nominer collectivement des personnalités mais aussi de partager des visions complémentaires argumentées de ce qui les rend inspirantes.
faq.delete_answer: In compliance with European regulations, you can ask to delete your account by contacting us on info@open-pantheon.org. Please use the email address you registered with.
faq.wikipedia_question: Why is it compulsory to choose a personality with a Wikipedia bio?
faq.wikipedia_answer: While allowing everyone to contribute to the Open Pantheon, we would like to make sure, especially during the launch phase, that the platform offers a range of figures that may be a source of inspiration for all viewers. For instance, while a wise grandfather or grandmother can definitely be a role model, it is key that the nominated personalities are chosen beyond the immediate family-community circle. Naturally, if a relative or a community member deserves to be more widely honoured, the possibility of creating a Wikipedia bio offers a straightforward way for them entering the Open Pantheon.
faq.anyone_question: Can I nominate any personality with a Wikipedia bio in My Pantheon?
faq.anyone_answer: Dictators, war heroes, famous outlaws and assassins, and other disreputable personalities may have a bio on Wikipedia, but shouldn’t be nominated on the Open Pantheon platform. The Open Pantheon aims at crowdsourcing exemplary figures in the field of learning, across all related disciplines, especially art, science, pedagogy, health and wellbeing, environment and peace. These categories already offer a broad choice to the organisations and individuals willing to contribute to the platform; they should be the core focus of all contributors. Naturally, prominent business leaders, politicians and other decision-makers also have their bio on Wikipedia, and may be considered in respect to specific achievements.
faq.irreproachable_question: It is rare for a personality to be irreproachable in all respects. What criteria should guide my personal Pantheon choices?
faq.irreproachable_answer: It is indeed rare for a personality to be irreproachable or to be unanimous, especially in a multicultural context. The challenge of the Open Pantheon is nevertheless to emphasise what, in each of the personalities honoured, deserves this recognition. This is the purpose of the comments section accompanying each nomination, which will highlight these qualities by offering a variety of angles of appreciation.
faq.minor_question: I’m under 18, can I still participate in the Open Pantheon?
faq.minor_answer: Yes you can add personalities to your Personal Pantheon. However, please note that the following data will be stored on our servers: your email (only visible by you, protected and never shared with anyone), your pseudo (visible by all visitors, chosen by yourself), your password (stored hashed, not visible by anyone, not even by the administrators and developers), your contributions (the figures you added to your Pantheon) and your comments, visible by everyone on the Web. You can delete them at any time. We also encourage you to create a collective Pantheon with your classmates. Don’t hesitate to propose this as a group activity to your teacher.
faq.how_many_personalities_question: How many personalities can I nominate in My Pantheon?
faq.how_many_personalities_answer: You are not limited in the number of personalities that you may nominate.
faq.how_many_links_question: How many links may I add to a given personality in My Pantheon?
faq.how_many_links_answer: You may add up to 10 meaningful links to each personality that you nominate. You can add links to any useful online resources, such as articles, books, videos, history websites, etc.
faq.delete_personality_question: Can I suppress a personality that I have nominated?
faq.delete_personality_answer: You can suppress a personality in your personal space “My Pantheon” at any given time. Open the page of the person you are celebrating, then click on the three dots in the corner of your comment and select “Delete”. If you were the only contributor to have initially chosen this personality, it will disappear from the platform. If other contributors have nominated this personality, only your tribute will disappear from the related comments.
faq.edit_question: Can I modify the succinct argument that I have written in support of a given nomination?
faq.edit_answer: You may modify any succinct argument that you have written simply by connecting to your personal space "My Pantheon".
faq.private_question: May I create My Pantheon and decide not to share it with the online community?
faq.private_answer: No, by registering on the Open Pantheon platform and nominating personalities in your personal Pantheon, you also explicitly agree to have your suggestions and comments shared with the Open Pantheon community and more widely with the general public visiting the online platform.
faq.gender_question: How do you expect to attain gender diversity?
faq.gender_answer: It is up to the community, both individuals and organisations, to aim for gender diversity when nominating the personalities of their choice. The Open Pantheon platform displays the gender split via a dedicated counter on the homepage, which may serve as an incentive if necessary. Wikipedia has recently added gender diversity support (i.e. transgender, non-binary, neutral...). However, the data is still rarely used. To date, we display only a male/female balance and will expand this in a future version.
faq.languages_question: Even if the Open Pantheon platform were soon to be accessible in all 6 official UN languages, this wouldn't allow all cultures to be represented on an equal footing. Isn’t this contradictory with the Open Pantheon’s goal? How do you plan to address this challenge?
faq.languages_answer: The Open Pantheon website was launched in September 2021 in English and French. Our immediate goal is to align with the UN and offer the platform in all 6 official languages as soon as possible (in 2022). In the near future, and if the Open Pantheon community grows in different parts of the world, our ambition is to create partnerships with organisations across other countries to help us provide translation in other languages too.
faq.no_translation_question: What will happen if a Wikipedia bio is available in one language of the platform and not in others?
faq.no_translation_answer: Any personality with a bio on Wikipedia, in at least one language, is eligible to be featured on the Open Pantheon website. If the bio is only available in one language, it will appear in this language until being translated on Wikipedia.
faq.moderation_question: How does the moderation system work? Who is ultimately responsible for determining the personalities who may or may not be celebrated on the global open platform?
faq.moderation_answer: The Open Pantheon is aligned with UNESCO’s mission of promoting world peace and security through international cooperation in education, the sciences, and culture. It is also supported by the #LearningPlanet community, a truly global network of leading educational organisations (institutions, universities, research centres, social entrepreneurs, etc.) across the world, already present in 120+ countries. The moderation process] will study carefully all reported cases of abuse and will act in accordance with the key principles guiding the international community. In case of very difficult decisions to be made, the moderator will call upon the expertise of key organisations within the #LearningPlanet community to seek advice. In the future, if the Open Pantheon is to grow massively, a more structured process may be structured, encompassing notably the creation of an official ethics committee.
faq.abuse_answer: You can report abuse simply by using the Contact form and selecting “Report abuse”. The contact form is accessible on all pages of the website in the top navigation bar.
